unr.neurotranslate.ui
Class MainApplication

java.lang.Object
  org.freedesktop.bindings.Pointer
      org.freedesktop.bindings.Proxy
          org.gnome.glib.Object
              org.gnome.gtk.Object
                  org.gnome.gtk.Widget
                      org.gnome.gtk.Container
                          org.gnome.gtk.Bin
                              org.gnome.gtk.Window
                                  unr.neurotranslate.ui.MainApplication

public class MainApplication
extends org.gnome.gtk.Window

The MainApplication class is responsible for creating the menu-bar, tab interface, and handling importing and exporting of files. A Table layout is used in order to hold all the widgets used in this tab.

Author:
nitish/kim
